explains: adv. 永久地；（问题或困难）不断发生地，一直存在地

sentences.en: The blast left him with permanently impaired hearing.
sentences.cn: 爆炸造成了他永久性听力损伤。

sentences.en: His confidence had been permanently affected by the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 他的信心已永久地被这次磨难影响了。

sentences.en: He was permanently strung out on heroin.
sentences.cn: 吸食海洛因使他整日神志恍惚。
